answers.answer: I have 41 days to go!! Due june 12!!! Im so excited! Congrats momma were getting closer!
Congrats to you too only 2 more appointments before I go every week! How exciting!!!
I've 55 days to go. Due June 26. Next week the countdown begins.

Less than 57 days to go. I'm going for another ultrasound today because I'm measuring 3 weeks 3 days ahead. Big baby!! I can't wait to see her face! I'm ready for my bones to stop aching, lol. Hurry up June!! :-)
39 days for me, had a little scare last night but turned out I was just dehydrated.
49 days to go and I can't wait!
58 days and counting!! Hoping (and praying) the time flies by FAST!!!
32 days for me <3 And I have a drs appt in at 4 and she's gonna check mee. Wooooo!
We're all getting so close!!!!! Congrats to all is june mamas lucky us we ony get half the hot summer pregnant lol

I have 30 days left but it's actually only 23 they were scheduling me to take her or a week early due to the fact that I have gestational diabetes. Good luck everyone. I hope everyone is happy and healthy.
I have 35 days to go due june 8 so cnt wait nervous & scared at the same d*** time but excited to see my little doll congrats to all the moms on the count down!
49 days, due 6/23. im so over this hot southern california weather so please make the count down a lot faster.

question: I only have 59 more days until my little man is due! Can't wait! 59 sounds so long compared to 2 months so Yayay 2 months to go. Due June 30!!! Any other excites June mamas?
title: Yay!!! It's may!
